Title: KOAN AKKU – EP RELEASE “Von Flammen ins Licht”
Description: Doors: 19:30 Start: 20:30 End: 22:30  feiern am Mittwoch, 5. November im LUCIA Wien die Veröffentlichung ihrer ersten EP „ “. Die Tiroler Mundart-Indie-Rock-Band liefert energiegeladenen Gitarrensound – Sprechgesang im Tiroler Dialekt mit Tiefgang, zwischen Indie-Rock, Post-Rock und progressiven Elementen.

Title: SOCIALOOP Semester Opening | Live Band + Clubbing
Description: Doors: 20:00 Start: 23:30 Jedes Jahr werden die Soziologie Erstis aufgerufen, sich zusammenzutun für ein gemeinsames Event von für und mit Studis. Wir haben 2 fixe Gruppen und dieses Jahr wird vermutlich eine weitere dazukommen. Performt werden Covers und eigene Songs im Genre-Mix.

Title: NOËSIS
Description: Some believe the best techno records are able to express emotion and attitude despite its dissonant and machine like nature; our guiding principle encupsualtes the showcase of records that destill that qualtiy. This night is for anyone who likes cerebral music that is a bit more experimental and takes time and a bit of patience for it to unfold.

Title: COMEUNITYDUB.VIENNA special guest: Alpha Steppa/ RootsMeesenJah HiFi & Treasure Isle
Description: at the head of the label Steppas Records, is one of themembers of the collective Dub Dynasty. fruit of the collaboration with his father and his aunt (Alpha & Omega). Ben Alpha aka  grew up surrounded by dubplates in sound system culture.

Title: PILE (USA) “Sunshine and Balance Beams”
Description: Start: 20:00 is the 9th studio album from Boston’s  , and their first for Chicago’s Sooper Records. Over 15 years,   has amassed legions of worldwide fans through relentless touring and writing. This resilience and dedication have earned them status as recognized standard bearers of the global rock underground.

Title: GÜRTEL CONNECTION #17
Description: = Über 60 Acts & DJs, 14 Locations, 1 Eintritt (Freiwillige Spende) und obendrein noch für einen guten Zweck: Bei der   habt ihr die Möglichkeit, gegen einen einmaligen Eintritt das umfangreiche Programm aller teilnehmenden Lokale in Anspruch zu nehmen.

Title: BiRCH! x THE PALAIS
Description: Start: 20:00 Get ready for an electrifying evening at Lucia Bar in Vienna featuring two powerhouse female-led bands,   and  . These talented English-speaking groups will light up the stage with their unique blend of melodic rock and indie pop, delivering music that champions female empowerment and passion.

Title: Das Schottische Prinzip – Albumpräsentation: „Golden Voyager Record Vol. III”
Description: Doors: 20:00 Start: 21:00 Es ist Spätsommer, und bei unserem Label Bader Molden Recordings herrscht Jubel: Das zweite Album der Band  , GOLDEN VOYAGER RECORD VOL. III, steht vor der Tür.

Title: VTOROI KA (KG) | EU TOUR 2025
Description: Doors: 19:00 Start: 20:00 Tape Capitol Music presents: VTOROI KA (KG) – First European Tour Live in Vienna | 24.10.2025 | Club Lucia Post-punk from Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan  aren’t just a band – they’re a phenomenon. Breakbeat meets irony, hip-hop crashes into post-soviet aesthetic, and everything pulses with the urgency of underground nightlife.

Title: Alien Chicks
Description: TICKET LINK  Alien Chicks are a trio hailing from the streets of South London, known for their electrifying blend of punk, rap and jazz. They create a sound that is both raw and innovative, capturing the spirit of London’s underground music culture.

Title: TECHNO OBSCENE #23 I NINE O NINE x LSH
Description: TICKET LINK DROP THE MASKS – FACE THE NIGHT. No show. Just us, TECHNO, and the freedom to be whoever you want. Dive into the music and snag your discounted tixx. First wave tickets for 9,09 € – a thank you to our real ones. Save cash, rave harder. This is TECHNO OBSCENE.

Title: WERK 2.0 – HALLOWEEN OPENING
Description: TICKET LINK Am 31. Oktober brennt die Nacht in voller Intensität.  Das Werk wird zum Raum aus Feuer, Nebel und Klang,  während Schatten im Licht der Flammen tanzen. Der Mainfloor wie ihr ihn noch nie gesehen habt.  Frisch umgebaut, – größer, härter, intensiver.

Title: VS – A FACE2FACE RAVE
Description: HERZFREQUENZ, STAY ACID & RUSH present: VS – A FACE2FACE RAVE Get ready for VS – a unique Rave experience where energy meets intensity FACE TO FACE.  This isn’t just a rave. It’s a clash of sounds and a battle of styles.

Title: RAVE AM MITTWOCH
Description: RECHARGE WEDNESDAYS +++ Das Bangen hat ein Ende, RAM geht weiter! Ganze 5 Termine stehen uns im Oktober bevor, ab sofort wieder am kompakteren Luster Floor. Wir danken euch für die unvergessliche Sommer Saison, gemeinsam haben wir den Mittwoch in Wien wieder zum Leben erweckt.

Title: HERZFREQUENZ presents: NIOTECH
Description: TICKET LINK  HERZFREQUENZ presents: NIOTECH ++++++++++++ HARD TECHNO combined with the ART OF DRAG!  THE RAVE with TURBO for a CROWD with a NEED for SPEED! ++++++++++++ NIOTECH (WHALIEN):  Niotech is a techno artist whose musical journey began with the harmonies of a piano.

Title: SLOW CRUSH (BE) THIRST – Album Release Tour
Description: VORVERKAUF TICKETS FB EVENT LINK  Slow Crush sind eine Band, die von der eigenen Evolution lebt.

Title: AUSTIN GIORGI
Description: VVK TICKET LINK  FB EVENT LINK Step into the night with Austin Giorgio.  Lose yourself in an evening of dark romance, where familiar songs pull you in and new ones from Chronicles of the Darkest Hour ignite the fire.  Be among the first to hear music from Chronicles of the Darkest Hour (Midnight), releasing this fall. The story unfolds.

Title: The K’s
Description: TICKET LINK SUPPORTBAND – MUDFIGHT! In British towns where nothing much besides real life happens, there’s enough peace to form plans and the abundant energy, momentum and initiative to fuel all notions of escape.

Title: Labelnacht w/ PRYDIE & LEONARD PALM
Description: TICKET LINK Get ready for the second edition of Labelnacht in 2025!  We have invited two special guests:  PRYDIE, who already came by for our first edition in march and has established himself as one of the GDN crowd favourites,  and LEONARD PALM, resident at Bootshaus Cologne and part of Unreal Germany & Chrome Cologne.
